name: Delivery Ninja
description:
A game where you deliver tea as a ninja

Objective

You must deliver the tea to the monk as quickly as possible while avoiding bandits

Controls

Move Left/Right: A/D
Jump: Space/W
Throw Knife: K
Pause Game: Escape
Toggle Music: M

Credits

Programmer & Artist: Zeperox
Composer: Cthethan
Special Thanks: Nikolai, NPC, Hector Azurite, Caino

Ninja art was heavily inspired by DaFluffyPotato's Lollipop Ninja
